definition: a thin fragment or slice (especially of wood) that has been shaved from something, form into slivers
details:
noun
- a thin fragment or slice (especially of wood) that has been shaved from something
= synonyms: shaving
- a small thin sharp bit or wood or glass or metal
= synonyms: splinter
verb
- form into slivers
= example: form into slivers
- break up into splinters or slivers
= synonyms: splinter
- divide into slivers or splinters
= synonyms: splinter
